main.name: Saurabh Joshi
main.description: Experienced Software Engineer working in Adtech
bio: Hi, I am Saurabh Joshi and I work as a Software Engineer at Kargo Global Inc., developing high-performance advertising solutions for mobile, desktop, and CTV.
I started my career in Quality Assurance (QA), where I built automated testing solutions and ensured system reliability.
Over time, I transitioned into software engineering, contributing to backend development, large-scale system optimizations, and ad tech integrations.
My experience includes working with real-time bidding (RTB), header bidding, OpenRTB, and Prebid, as well as optimizing bidding strategies and maintaining integrations with publishers and DSPs.

I hold an M.S. in Information Sciences & Technologies from RIT and a B.E. in IT from Mumbai University. Outside of work, I enjoy hiking, cooking vegetarian food, learning guitar, and exploring new technologies.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

projects.title: RESTful API Client for Emergency Service Directory
projects.category: Designed and developed using module pattern, a Web portal for emergency services with User Interface.

projects.title: Enhanced RTO Driving License system
projects.category: A prototype system which can work on any touchscreen mobile device containing NFC by law enforcement officer.

projects.title: Tweets Search application
projects.category: Simple application to search tweets using MongoDB and Node.js. Based on the user query the application creates a list on the Frontend.

projects.title: Weather application using React.js
projects.category: Single page weather application with react.js and Open Weather Map API. Application provided latest weather update of various cities around the world.

projects.title: Fake news Data Analysis
projects.category: Creation of data models such as linear regression to get meaningful analysis on data on fake news.

projects.title: Performance Appraisal System
projects.category: Designed and developed appraisal system for diploma college in which students can appraise the performance of the professors in confidential pattern.

projects.title: Soccer Dream Team Web application
projects.category: Vanilla JavaScript application exhibiting the dynamically created dropdown menu after selecting each choice to create a futsal (five-aside football) team.

projects.title: Data Warehouse creation
projects.category: Created a Data warehouse project where data from three different division of a company was cleaned and transformed using MS Excel and Pentaho before loading in the star schema database created using MySQL Workbench (ETL).

projects.title: California Fire Arc-Gis Mapping
projects.category: GIS based analysis of forest fires in the state of California.Created various GIS based maps for understanding the threats related to forest fires and option for its mitigation.

projects.title: Mobile App review based classification
projects.category: Text mining and analysis of the unstructured data from google play of various android applications.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!

information.title: Assocate Software Engineer
information.subtitle: Kargo Global Inc.
description: Transitioned from QA to Software Engineering, developing product solutions for Kargo’s large-scale distributed advertising auction platform,

optimizing bidding strategies, integrating a critical CTV solution, and leading multiple projects to enhance ad-serving capabilities, all while maintaining seamless integrations with publishers and DSPs.

information.title: Assocate Software Engineer in Test
information.subtitle: Kargo Global Inc.
description: Led QA efforts for both the Kraken and Data teams, developing and optimizing automated testing,
QA processes, and ad serving infrastructure for Kraken’s SSP, contributing to significant revenue growth and successful migration to in-house solutions.

information.title: Student Lab Assistant
information.subtitle: RIT, Dept of IST
description: Helping System Administrator with looking after lab requirements and resolving software hardware
and networking issues. Maintaining the inventory for all the department labs.
